labels.name: story
labels.value: Navigate to QA Jobs and verify lever pages

name: Happy path â€“ Istanbul QA jobs and apply flow on Lever

statusDetails.message:
The following asserts failed:
	'Submit your application' visibility mismatch. Expected form to be visible but was: false expected [true] but found [false]

description:
1. Open QA jobs listing with team=Quality Assurance
2. Verify URL, 4 filters, group title and job listing present
3. Filter Location: Istanbul, Turkiye
4. Assert job list & contents
5. Open job detail for first Istanbul role
6. Verify detail header (title, location, department, Remote, Full-Time)
7. Click 'Apply for this job' and verify navigation + header + form

steps.name: Verify we are on QA jobs page URL
Check Team filter is selected as Quality Assurance
Get job work type from list
Get job link href from list
Check job Apply button is visible
Click Apply button on first job card
Get job title on detail page
Get workplace type on detail page
Check 'Apply for this job' button is visible
Click 'Apply for this job' on detail page
Get job title on apply page
Get workplace type on apply page
Check 'Submit your application' section is visible
